comment.author: Brian
comment.text: You mean us too Hillary? You know the people in Ohio and Penn? The ones you said with our guns and bibles, we will believe anything you say? Also you called us White Trash! No vote from this White Trash. I will share and share until each person knows what you think about us in Ohio and Penn. Really tired of being called names. I am not the one running, you are.

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: She didn't say that. If that's what you think of yourself, I'm so sorry. And by the way, when will win Ohio.

replies.author: Brian
replies.text: According to Wikileaks, this is what she said and her cronies.------http://endingthefed.com/wikileaks-to-expose-dnc-strategy-session-emails-show-operatives-call-pa-and-oh-voters-white-trash.html
